changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, role_id BIGINT, full_name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, password VARCHAR(255), sent_code VARCHAR(255), gender VARCHAR(10), attachment_id BIGINT, card_number VARCHAR(20), phone_number VARCHAR(20), FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES role (id), FOREIGN KEY (attachment_id) REFERENCES attachment (id) )
